General.Name: Resorttrust Inc
General.Description: Resorttrust, Inc. engages in the hotel and restaurant business. The company is also involved in the golf club operation, medical business, and other businesses. It operates 40 resort and city hotels in Japan and 1 in Hawaii, as well as 13 golf courses in Japan. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.
